title: Socialisation: Secondary Socialisation with Peer Groups üè¢ - A Level Sociology Learning & Revision
description:
Emma looks at the secondary socialisation that occurs within peer groups and the workplace for your A level Sociology exam. She looks at peer-group pressure as well as norms related to age. Perfect for the AQA exam board. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
